snippet: Art Fair 2.0 takes a second stab at the virtual exhibition (and the Web site runs more smoothly this year).
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews VIP Art Fair 2.0, the second year of the first major online art show.
lead_paragraph: Art Fair 2.0 takes a second stab at the virtual exhibition (and the Web site runs more smoothly this year).

headline.seo: VIP Art Fair 2.0 Is Virtual, Modeled on the Traditional
headline.main: An Art Expo on the Web, Virtual Fairgoer Included
headline.print_headline: An Art Expo on the Web, Virtual Fairgoer Included
